subject: Mental Health
title: Normal Worry vs. Anxiety Disorder
description: A quick win: understand Normal Worry vs. Anxiety Disorder.

hook.text: Everyone worries before a job interview or a big exam. That's perfectly normal.

buildup.text: But when the worry refuses to stop even after the exam is over, something shifts.

discovery.text: Clinical anxiety is persistent, excessive, and disrupts daily functioning.

twist.text: People with anxiety disorders often know their fears are irrational but can't stop.

climax.text: The line between normal and disorder isn't about feeling anxious â€” it's impairment.

punchline.text: Worry visits. Anxiety disorder moves in.
